Short Bar Width.description: Width of short mob health bars

Medium Bar Width.description: Width of medium mob health bars

Long Bar Width.description: Width of long mob health bars

Boss Bar Width.description: Width of boss mob health bars

Display Mob HP Bar.description: Whether to display health bars for regular mobs

Display Boss HP Bar.description: Whether to display health bars for boss mobs

Display Damage Text.description: Whether to display damage text upon hit

Display Health Numbers.description: Whether to display health numbers on health bars

Min Mob HP.description: Minimum HP for showing mob health bars(e.g. Some environment objects have HP too)

Min Medium Bar HP.description: Minimum HP for switching to medium mob health bars

Min Long Bar HP.description: Minimum HP for switching to long mob health bars

Min Boss Bar HP.description: Minimum HP for switching to boss mob health bars. (120 is the HP of Moss Mother)

HP Color.description: Color of the health portion of the health bar

Delayed Effect Color.description: Color of the delayed effect portion of the health bar

HP Bar Background Color.description: Color of the health bar background

HP Number Color.description: Color of the health numbers on the health bar

Crit Hit Color.description: Color of critical hit damage text

Max Z Position.description: Minimum absolute Z position to be considered as shown

Visible Cache Seconds.description: Time in seconds to cache visibility state

Invisible Cache Seconds.description: Time in seconds to cache visibility state

Infinite HP Threshold.description: HP value considered as infinite HP

Sprite Tracker Z Offset.description: Z offset for the Sprite Tracker component on mob health bars.

Weight Of New Hit.description: Weight of new hit in exponential moving average calculation.
